'''Beta 1.3''' is a version of [[Java Edition Beta]] released on February 22, 2011,<ref>[[wordofnotch:3446675806|Minecraft Beta 1.3]] – The Word of Notch, February 22, 2011</ref> which added [[redstone repeater]]s, [[bed]]s, three types of [[slab]]s, and a new [[splash]] screen, notably among other changes and fixes, the world save format was changed from [[Java Edition Alpha level format|Alpha level format]] to [[Region file format|McRegion]].

Beta 1.3 was uploaded at 17:13 UTC, this version contained debug code that spawns the player with 64 [[torch]]es, a [[diamond pickaxe]], a [[diamond shovel]], a [[diamond axe]], and 64 [[bed]]s upon respawning or creating a world. 
Beta 1.3 was reuploaded at 17:33 UTC to remove the debug code that the player spawns with items, listed above in a new world.<ref>{{tweet|notch|40102558051733504|Err, yes... as USUAL, we managed to release it with debug item spawning code in it. Re-download. :D}}</ref> Beta 1.3 was then reuploaded again at 17:50 UTC<ref>[[notchtweet:40106503478181888|"@dw_edwin Try again now. Restart the client so it loads the new update.. Does it work any better?"]] @notch (Markus Persson) on X (formerly Twitter), February 22, 2011</ref> to fix a crash bug when opening the world menu without a saves folder. This last version is listed in the launcher as '''Beta 1.3b''' (''old_beta b1.3b'').

=== Non-mob entities ===
'''New [[painting]]'''
* "Skull On Fire" [[File:Burning Skull Painting JE2 BE1.png|128px]] 
** Code to make this painting display was added in [[Beta 1.2_01]], but the texture itself was not added until this version, resulting in [[Java Edition placeholder texture uses|the use]] of the [[Placeholder texture#Texture atlas blank spaces|painting placeholder texture]].

=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|whitelist}}'''
* Added whitelisting to multiplayer servers.
** Can turn on/off the whitelist.
** Can add/remove players from the whitelist.
** Can give a list of whitelisted players and reload that list.

=== Textures ===
'''[[File:Crying Obsidian (texture) JE0 BE0.png|32px]] [[Crying Obsidian]]'''
* Added a texture for crying obsidian to {{mono|[[terrain.png]]}}.
** Texture went unused and removed in [[Beta 1.5]], but re-added in [[20w10a]] via the [[Programmer Art]] [[Resource Pack]].

=== General ===
[[File:Loading Screen JE3.png|thumb|right|Loading screen added in this version.]]
'''[[Lighting]]'''
* Smooth lighting engine added with the help of MrMessiah.

'''[[Option]]s'''
* New graphics setting screen.
** Added "Smooth Lighting" option.

'''[[Splash screen]]'''
* New Mojang logo.

'''[[File:Smooth Stone Slab JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Smooth Stone Slab|Stone Slabs]]'''

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Gunpowder JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Gunpowder]]'''
* Renamed from "Sulphur".

=== Mobs ===
'''General'''
* Fewer passive mobs spawn when on harder difficulties.

'''[[File:Cow JE3.png|32px]] [[Cow]]s'''
* Texture changed from [[File:Cow JE2.png|32px]].

'''[[File:Slime JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Slime]]s'''
* Now spawn again.

'''[[File:Squid JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Squid]]'''
* Can no longer be milked.
* Squid now have the ability to move in three dimensions (rather than only along the bottom of the body of [[water]])

=== World generation ===
'''[[Create New World]]'''
* Players can now choose the name of the world before creation.
* Players can now choose the [[world seed]] before creation.
* More than 5 worlds can now be created at once.
* Delete world message now includes "(A long time!)" after "(world name) will be lost forever!".
** Prior to this, it just says "'<world name>' will be lost forever!".

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Third person mode]]'''
* View bobbing now applies while in third person, if enabled.

=== General ===
'''[[Control]]s'''
* {{key|F1}} and {{key|F3}} are now toggled when pressed.
* When {{key|F3}} is toggled on, mobs display their unique entity ID numbers over their heads.
* {{key|F8}} toggles mouse smoothing.

'''[[Options]]'''
* Scrollbars added in the world selection screen.
* Players can now change the names of existing worlds.
** This doesn't change the world's save id.

'''[[Region file format|McRegion]]'''
* Worlds now use a generic McRegion chunk save format, with a built-in auto conversion.

'''[[Texture pack]]s'''
* Scrollbars added in the texture pack list.

== Fixes ==
'''10 bugs fixed'''
* When breaking double slabs (one slab placed on another) it now drops two slabs instead of one.
* Wood doesn't burn forever anymore.
* Grassland/sand related biome border fixed (boundaries line up, rather than obviously show chunk borders).
* No longer receiving Java Log error .txt file spam in the minecraft.exe folder when closing the Minecraft client program.
* Players can no longer use the click-release to quickly mine blocks (referred to as "click mining") in multiplayer.
* Players no longer glitch when standing on [[fence]]s in multiplayer.
* Players can no longer milk [[squid]]s.
* When right-clicking on a wooden door while holding a bow or fishing rod, arrows no longer are fired into the door, nor is the fishing hook cast into the door.
* Hostile mobs can now be attacked properly in multiplayer.
* [[Lapis Lazuli Ore]] now drops 4-8 [[Lapis Lazuli]] in multiplayer.</onlyinclude>
